General.Name: Guangdong Champion Asia Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Champion Asia Electronics Co.,Ltd. develops, produces, and sells high-density double-sided and multilayer printed circuit boards in the People's Republic of China. The company provides small and medium batch, mass production, flexible and rigid-flexible, and special PCB; and SMT and EMS services. Its products are primarily used in consumer electronics, car electronics, IT communication, industrial control, security, power, energy, and medical sectors. Guangdong Champion Asia Electronics Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Huizhou, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 25 Digital Industrial Park, Huizhou, China

3.Name: Mr. Peng  Li
